sellerCard.description:
This is Md Shakil Khan (S.I khan)
Professional web developer in WordPress .  I will build any professional website and cost-effective design. From my previous experience, the website that I will make you will lead your business to a lot of growth. If you have not any knowledge about websites, if you are a non-technical person then don’t take any stress, I will guide you. You can get from me a functional responsive website design and user-friendly website. I can create many types of website like:
#E-commerce
#Blog/Magazine/
#Business
#Hotel Booking 
#LMS
#Portfolio
#Affiliate
#Listing

description.content:
Hi, I'm S.I Khan


If you are looking for a Professional Elementor WordPress website

then you are in the right place. I can design high-quality responsive wordpress elementor website or convert PSD, XD, FIGMA or Web pages into a WordPress site using elementor pro page builder & crocoblock.




What will you get?

------------


  • ️Convert or clone any web page
  • ️Convert PSD to Elementor Template 
  • ️Redesign Website using Elementor pro
  • ️Integrate your favourite marketing tools.
  • ️Design Unique Sales Page
  • ️Fix Elementor Issues
  • ️100% Responsive Design
  • ️Any type of form that will need to integrate with MailChimp or your server mail system
  • ️And many more premium features!


Why did you hire me?

-------------

  • 100% quality full service to your satisfaction.
  • 3+ years experience as WordPress Developer Elementor Expert.
  • 100% refund if you are not satisfied.
  • So faster delivery.
  • I will allow revision.
  • Even after the order is complete, I still provide future support for any .


If you are confused and not clear properly what to do then just knock me and sit back comfortably. I will do the rest of the work and give you a complete solution.


Thank You so much , Have a great day.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It'll depend on your project. Common for every project is if a new website must need Domain & Hosting Cpanel login and if already have installed WordPress then just WordPress login(in some cases Cpanel/FTP). Just inform a brief about your project, I will assist you with what you need for your

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will be happy to know today 25% of the world's websites run on WordPress and the most interesting thing is WordPress Is 99% SEO Friendly according to Google. Also WordPress is a User-Friendly & High-security standard.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why Elementor?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Elementor is a drag-and-drop page builder for WordPress. This plugin helps you create beautiful pages using a visual editor. It's designed for you to build dynamic websites quickly. This WordPress plugin is an all-in-one solution—letting you control every part of your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm not a technical person. Will I be able to edit or modify my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! You can easily edit your website content (text + images) and update and modify it with a single click and visual drag-drop options. Also, I'll send you a video tutorial on how you can edit your website without any coding knowledge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Don't have any Idea about the Website, Theme or Design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry about this, I'll assist You. Please inform about your website topic and services. Then I'll manage the entire journey.

reviews.comment: Again you did an amazing job brother
He is amazing very fast and professional guy highly recommended

I'm at a loss for words. I truly wish I had an unlimited budget to reward him with a substantial bonus, but unfortunately, as an NGO, our resources are limited. Nonetheless, I must express my admiration for his exceptional work and unwavering patience. His dedication humbles me. I wholeheartedly recommend this seller; his value far surpasses every cent spent, and I believe he deserves recognition beyond measure.

seller_response.comment: Thanks For your Valuable review . Its pleasure to me work for you. You are really great person. Take love from the core of my heart.

reviews.comment: Very Very professional and I highly recommend his work.
He’s definitely my Wordpress guy. Very great communication and expertise. Sorry I slowed you down. Next it won’t happen again.
